Package oracle.apps.fnd.applcore.flex.runtime.resource

Interface Summary
ReplicableResourceBundle A resource bundle that contains replicable resources.
 

Class Summary
Bundle A resource bundle.
BundleReplicationTask A task that creates new resource bundles for a list of languages from existing replicable resource bundles.
BundleReplicator<T extends Bundle> A tool that creates resource bundles for a list of languages from a replicable resource bundle.
ReplicableResource A resource that contains information about how it can be replicated.
ReplicableViewDefBundle A replicable resource bundle that is stored in the form of a view object.
ResourceReplicator<T extends ReplicableResource> A tools that replicates a resource.
TableResource A replicable resource that is based on a translation table in a database.
TableResourceReplicator A replicator that replicates a table-based replicable resource.
Translatable A string resource that is translatable and replicable.
UniversalResource A resource that remains the same in all languages.
UniversalResourceReplicator A tool that replicates a universal resource.
ViewDefBundle A resource bundle in the form of a view object.
ViewDefBundleReplicator A replicator that creates ViewDefBundle objects from a replicable resource bundle.
 

Enum Summary
FlexfieldBundles A collection of flexfield resource bundles.
TranslationTable A translation table.
